Tucson acknowledges Kup's com link, having already gotten himself in neutra=
l.

"I - already did Kup, I'm ready - to roll. Thank you.  Perhaps - now, w=
e will have time to regather our thoughts and - hopefully the strength we n=
eed to defend ourselves from future onslaughts."

Night Shift takes up a li=
ne to help towe Tucson back to the Ark.

" Thank Primus Perceptor had a gre=
at trick up his manifold.  Maan, if we didn't have him we would've been in =
the ditch, big time."

Tucson flashes his headlights.

"You're right, this =
wouldn't have ended well if Perceptor had not helped us as he did.  When we=
 get back, I think we should definitely make it official, that he is now a =
- Maximal instead of a Predicon."

Straight Shot now sits with Talon in Tuc=
son's cab. She thinks things over a moment then leans on Tucson's dash boar=
d, with a raised brow.

" What if we made him both Maximal and Autobot?  He=
 certainly deserves the title."

Tucson replies.

" Hmm, yes, make him of b=
oth factions.  Thus strengthening his ties to us as a comrade.   You know, =
that - may not be such a bad idea for all of us.  I'll - run that by Lord E=
lder when we - get back."

It was apparent that Tucson was extremely exhaus=
ted from his ordeal, and that a few days in a CR chamber would do him much =
good.

clear this
